Package com.waddle_ware.heslington_hustle.Screens

Class NameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.waddle_ware.heslington_hustle.Screens.NameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    public class NameScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    CHANGELOG : NEW CLASS This class handles the screen in which the user enters their name upon game completion
